description.narrative: This project will create systems, policies and capacities at brand and supplier levels that enable improved wage outcomes among Hunkemöller suppliers in Myanmar, whilst formulating an approach and tools that will allow them and other AGT members to scale improved wage risk management throughout their supply chains. It will accomplish this through development of a holistic Wage Risk Assessment Framework, followed by efforts to internalise and apply the framework to produce tailored corrective action plans at brand and supplier level that make use of innovative tools and approaches. The project will also incorporate assessment of critical factors in the enabling environment in Myanmar. Outcomes (framework / project experiences) will be shared with the AGT.The approach benefits suppliers, workers, and buyers, creating linkages between CSR risk management and commercial decision making as well as providing brands with an approach aligned with industry accountability and transparency norms. This vision is also aligned with the strategy to maximise the benefits and mitigate vulnerabilities caused by the increasing exposure of the sector in Myanmar to EU-based buyers.
